i0._description: Input Method Engine transform:   Used to indicate an input method transformation, such as one used by   a client-side input method. The first subfield in a sequence would   typically be a 'platform' or vendor designation.

handwrit._description: Handwriting input: Used when the only information known (or requested) is that the text was (or is to be) converted using an handwriting input.

pinyin._description: Pinyin input: for simplified Chinese characters. See also http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pinyin_method.

und._description: The choice of input method is not specified. Used when the only information known (or requested) is that the text was (or is to be) converted using an input method engine

wubi._description: Wubi input: for simplified Chinese characters. For background information, see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wubi_method
